thread.title: Florida Senate votes to arm some school staff

title: Florida Senate votes to arm some school staff
text:
Florida Senate votes to arm some school staff 8:46am GMT - 01:16 
Florida's Republican-controlled Senate votes to exclude most classroom teachers from a plan to allow school staff to carry firearms, as part of a gun control bill in response to a shooting in Parkland that left 17 people dead.   
Florida's Republican-controlled Senate votes to exclude most classroom teachers from a plan to allow school staff to carry firearms, as part of a gun control bill in response to a shooting in Parkland that left 17 people dead.  //reut.rs/2oSGoQV
